LunarSalmon_description: A rare salmon that can only be caught under the stars.
MudTrout_description: A common trout that loves mud.
ArmoredCatfish_description: A very hard and pokey catfish.
WhiteSturgeon_description: A very white sturgeon species that has lost the pigment in its scales over the centuries.
MossyCod_description: A very unique species of cod that produces a film on its scales, perfect for growing moss.
GhostPike_description: A very rare species of pike that is almost invisible in water.
RadioactiveSunfish_description: A very radioactive species of sunfish that glows.
